TF_VAR_dbt_account_id.description: dbt Cloud Account ID (can be found in Account Settings)

TF_VAR_dbt_token.description: dbt Cloud API token secret needed to authenticate into the service.

TF_VAR_dbt_host_url.description: dbt Cloud API host URL (commonly https://cloud.getdbt.com/api)

AES_256_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Create an encryption key to store terraform state (use `openssl rand -base64 32` in terminal to create).
